subject: Automobile Racing
Drug Abuse and Traffic
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Two months after failing a drug test, the Nascar driver Jeremy Mayfield received a temporary injunction, freeing him to race at Daytona.
snippet: Two months after failing a drug test, the Nascar driver Jeremy Mayfield received a temporary injunction, freeing him to race at Daytona.
